name: Population by age group to 2100 (based on UNWPP, 2017 medium scenario)
title: Population by age group to 2100 (based on UNWPP, 2017 medium scenario)
description: Dataset was compiled by Our World in Data by combining historical estimates (1950-2015) published by the UN World Population Prospects (2017) Revision, and its medium scenario projected to 2100.

sources.name: Population by age group to 2100 (based on UNWPP, 2017 medium scenario)
sources.dataPublishedBy: United Nations, Department of Economic and Social Affairs, Population Division (2017). World Population Prospects: The 2017 Revision, DVD Edition.
sources.additionalInfo: Dataset was compiled by Our World in Data by combining historical estimates (1950-2015) published by the UN World Population Prospects (2017) Revision, and its medium scenario projected to 2100.

resources.path: Population by age group to 2100 (based on UNWPP, 2017 medium scenario).csv

fields.name: Under 15 years old (UNWPP, 2017)
fields.description: Total population of under 15 year olds based on historic estimates from 1950-2015, and UN medium scenario projections to 2100.

fields.name: Working age (15-64 years old) (UNWPP, 2017)
fields.description: Total population aged 15-64 years old based on historic estimates from 1950-2015, and UN medium scenario projections to 2100. This age group is defined by the UN as the working-age population.

fields.name: 65+ years old (UNWPP, 2017)
fields.description: Total population aged 65+ years old based on historic estimates from 1950-2015, and UN medium scenario projections to 2100.

fields.name: Under 5 years old (UNWPP, 2017)
fields.description: Total population under 5 years old based on historic estimates from 1950-2015, and UN medium scenario projections to 2100.

fields.name: 5-14 years old (UNWPP, 2017)
fields.description: Total population aged 5-14 years old based on historic estimates from 1950-2015, and UN medium scenario projections to 2100.

fields.name: 15-24 years old (UNWPP, 2017)
fields.description: Total population aged 15-24 years old based on historic estimates from 1950-2015, and UN medium scenario projections to 2100.

fields.name: 25-64 years old (UNWPP, 2017)
fields.description: Total population aged 25-64 years old based on historic estimates from 1950-2015, and UN medium scenario projections to 2100.
